item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to MLL Electronics! I’m Michael Liang, a Senior at the University of Akron studying Electrical and Electronic Engineering. I have a wide variety of skills and experiences that covering every aspect from electrical engineering, to mechanical design and entrepreneurship. Currently working as a freelance Electrical Engineering consultant with experience in hardware development, rapid prototyping and design for manufacturing in both an industrial and consumer space. I’m currently looking for a Full time job in Electrical Engineering come December 2021.
